1: The Lord is my shepherd. I lack nothing.
2: He causes me to lie down in green pastures. He leads me beside quiet waters.
3: He restores my soul. He guides me in paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
4: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me. Your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
5: You set a table for me in the presence of my foes. You drench my head with oil.[a] My cup is overflowing.
6: Surely goodness and mercy will pursue me all the days of my life, and I will live in the house of the Lord forever.[b]
